metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9525 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.Description:
In the cron package through 3.0pl1-128 on Debian, and through3.0pl1-128ubuntu2 on Ubuntu, the postinst maintainer script allows forgroup-crontab-to-root privilege escalation via symlink attacks againstunsafe usage of the chown and chmod programs.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9525` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cron - 3.0pl1-134ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cron package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0pl1-134ubuntu1').
